ygData.subject: Mediocre players...
ygData.msgSnippet: I really don t know if it is a lot of mediocre players are hitting the 50+ range, or if it is all the twinks: a friend went to twink his newb rogue in guk
ygData.messageBody:
I really don't know if it is a lot of "mediocre players" are hitting
the 50+ range, or if it is all the twinks:

"a friend went to twink his newb rogue in guk last night using
his druid and he got from lev 1 to lev 17 in 5 hours in upper
guk. I know he's loving the new xp system."
-- Minkin

I know of a level 50 warrior in my guild who has less than
five /played days (second computer with 50+ cleric/50+ chanter
characters), and, as far as I know, has never grouped. Do you think I
plan on putting my life on the line assuming he knows how to play his
class?

Gaelthorne
Xegony
